articles.title: Body found in SC's Sumter County
articles.description: SUMTER, S.C. (AP) — The body of a 23-year-old South Carolina man was found early Wednesday morning, the Sumter County Sheriff’s Office said.
articles.content:
SUMTER, S.C. (AP) The body of a 23-year-old South Carolina man was found early Wednesday morning, the Sumter County Sheriffs Office said.
Officials said the body of Montrel Epps was found around 4:30 a.m. by a deputy during a property check after seeing Epps… [+610 chars]

articles.title: Michigan family reunites with dog that ran after car crash
articles.description: WOODHAVEN, Mich (AP) — A suburban Detroit family has been reunited with their dog, days after the canine ran off following a car crash.
articles.content:
WOODHAVEN, Mich (AP) A suburban Detroit family has been reunited with their dog, days after the canine ran off following a car crash.
Red, a golden retriever, was ejected from the family's vehicle on Dec. 25 after it hit a slick spot along an exit on Interst… [+1146 chars]

articles.title: Wild at Target: 2021 NHL Winter Classic headed to Minnesota
articles.description: DALLAS (AP) — The 2021 NHL Winter Classic will be hosted by the Minnesota Wild at Target Field, the home stadium of the MLB's Twins.
articles.content: FILE - In this June 30, 2013 file photo, members of the Armed Forces hold a large flag at Target field in Minneapolis where the Minnesota Twins hosted Armed Forces Appreciation Day prior to the baseball game between the Twins and the Kansas City Royals. The 2… [+1508 chars]

articles.author: By BRIAN MAHONEY AP Basketball Writer
articles.title: David Stern, NBA’s commissioner for 30 years, dies at 77
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — David Stern, who spent 30 years as the NBA's longest-serving commissioner and oversaw its growth into a global power, has died on New Year’s Day. He was 77.
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) David Stern, who spent 30 years as the NBA's longest-serving commissioner and oversaw its growth into a global power, has died on New Years Day. He was 77.
The league says Stern died Wednesday with his family by his side. He suffered a brain he… [+849 chars]

articles.title: 49ers sign DT Earl Micthell for postseason
articles.description: SANTA CLARA, Calif. (AP) — The San Francisco 49ers have signed defensive tackle Earl Mitchell to a contract for the playoffs Wednesday and waived defensive back Antone Exum Jr.
articles.content:
SANTA CLARA, Calif. (AP) The San Francisco 49ers have signed defensive tackle Earl Mitchell to a contract for the playoffs Wednesday and waived defensive back Antone Exum Jr.

articles.title: NBA says former commissioner David Stern has died at age 77 nearly 3 weeks after suffering brain hemorrhage
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — NBA says former commissioner David Stern has died at age 77 nearly 3 weeks after suffering brain hemorrhage.

articles.title: SC city's police chief resigns
articles.description: GREENVILLE, S.C. (AP) — A South Carolina city's police chief, who had been under investigation for allegedly giving preferential treatment to a businessman, has resigned.
articles.content:
GREENVILLE, S.C. (AP) A South Carolina city's police chief, who had been under investigation for allegedly giving preferential treatment to a businessman, has resigned.

articles.title: Lyons scores 40, hits 10 3s to carry Furman past VMI 89-73
articles.description: LEXINGTON, Va. (AP) — Jordan Lyons had a season-high 40 points, making 10 of 12 3-pointers, as Furman defeated VMI 89-73 on Wednesday.
articles.content:
LEXINGTON, Va. (AP) Jordan Lyons had a season-high 40 points, making 10 of 12 3-pointers, as Furman defeated VMI 89-73 on Wednesday.
Lyons became the first Paladin to score 40 points since Stephen Croone in an 86-63 win over Liberty on Dec. 20, 2013. Lyons i… [+1008 chars]

articles.title: Ice jam near Mandan causes Missouri River to rise
articles.description: MANDAN, N.D. (AP) — Authorities say an ice jam along the Missouri River near Mandan is causing water to rise, threatening property along the shoreline.
articles.content:
MANDAN, N.D. (AP) Authorities say an ice jam along the Missouri River near Mandan is causing water to rise, threatening property along the shoreline.
